meanings.definition: A person who climbs mountains, especially in the Alps.
meanings.sent1: The brave alpinist reached the summit of the mountain.
meanings.sent2: The group of alpinists planned their next expedition.
meanings.sent3: The alpinist forgot their climbing gear and had to use a rope made of scarves.
meanings.sent4: She was an alpinist in the world of finance, always reaching new heights in her career.
meanings.sent5: The young alpinist's determination to conquer the peak inspired others to follow their dreams.

meanings.definition: A member of a group of people who climb mountains, especially in the Alps.
meanings.sent1: An experienced alpinist led the team through the treacherous terrain.
meanings.sent2: The alpinists set up base camp at the foot of the mountain.
meanings.sent3: The alpinist in charge of food brought only chocolate bars for the expedition.
meanings.sent4: As an alpinist of the culinary world, she scaled new recipes with ease.
meanings.sent5: The dedicated alpinist guided the group with unwavering determination.
